body.name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Lactic Acid & Salicylic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free & Allergy Tested | 19 Ounce
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.
features: [ CERAVE MOISTURIZING LOTION WITH SALICYLIC ACID ] Body moisturizer that gently exfoliates dry, scaly, or rough and bumpy skin on legs and upper arms. Lightweight, non-greasy feel that leaves skin feeling soft and smooth.

[ EXFOLIATE & MOISTURIZE ] Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid to help exfoliate, Hyaluronic Acid to help retain skin's moisture, and Niacinamide to help calm skin. SA is a Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA), an exfoliator that removes dead skin cells and smooths skin.
[ GENTLE ON SKIN ] Suitable for body. Fragrance free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic. Can be paired with CeraVe Renewing Salicylic Acid Cleanser for Rough and Bumpy Skin to cleanse & exfoliate.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.
body.description: Developed with dermatologists, skin smoothing CeraVe Renewing SA Lotion has a unique lightweight formula that exfoliates and moisturizes while helping to restore the protective skin barrier. Salicylic acid exfoliates and softens to smooth rough skin, lactic acid exfoliates to renew skin’s surface and three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) help to restore the protective skin barrier.•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formulaKey Ingredients:•Salicylic Acid: Exfoliates for soft, smooth skin•Vitamin D: Provides antioxidant protection•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier•Hyaluronic acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture•Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: #1 Dermatologist Recommended Skincare Brand Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe has a complete line of skincare to cleanse and moisturize skin. CeraVe contains the three essential ceramides (called 1, 3, and 6-II) healthy skin needs. Delivered through a patented, controlled-release technology, this formula with ceramides helps rebuild the skin's protective barrier and locks in moisture all day. Renewing SA Lotion - 19 Fluid Ounce Product Technology Developed with dermatologists, skin smoothing CeraVe Renewing SA Lotion has a unique lightweight formula that exfoliates and moisturizes while helping to restore the protective skin barrier. Salicylic acid exfoliates and softens to smooth rough skin, lactic acid exfoliates to renew skin’s surface and three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) help to restore the protective skin barrier. With ceramides 1, 3 and 6-II Salicylic acid softens and smoothes skin Lactic acid exfoliates Non-comedogenic Fragrance-free, hypoallergenic Gentle, non-irritating formula

Product Features and Benefits How to Use Step 1: Cleanse with CeraVe Renewing SA Cleanser. Step 2: Moisturize with CeraVe Renewing SA Lotion. MVE Delivery Technology Our MultiVesicular Emulsion (MVE) ensures moisturizing ingredients are delivered to the skin slowly over time, lasting long after you apply it. Salicylic Acid Helps exfoliate and soften - essential in smoothing rough skin. Fragrance-Free To avoid fragrance irritation.

The CeraVe Difference 3 Essential Ceramides All CeraVe products contain the vital ceramides healthy skin needs to help restore and maintain its natural protective barrier. The Role of Ceramides Ceramides are an essential part of the skin's natural barrier. They hydrate all day to help restore the protective skin barrier. Developed with Dermatologists Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Renewing SA Lotion exfoliates, softens, and smoothes extremely dry, rough, bumpy skin. Gentle on Skin Non-irritating formula.

Reduces the look of dark circles and puffiness as ceramides help repair and restore. Exfoliates, softens, and smoothes extremely dry, rough, bumpy skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very nicely!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this, as I do pretty much everything from CeraVe. I use this in conjunction with the body wash and my skin is super smooth and soft. I use the lotion mostly on my upper arms where I do tend to have a little bit of bumpy skin and it takes care of it immediately.If you are using this for the first time put it on in the evening and give it overnight and you will have smooth skin in the morning.I can only highly recommend this and will be purchasing this again, just wish it came in a larger size. Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact it dries fast on skin and it feels smooth. I’m just not happy about how the bottle is small. I use it all over my body so think it would last only for two weeks. But otherwise it’s great lotion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Even though I can buy cheaper lotion, this lotion does actually help get rid of rough and bumpy skin. It is not scented and it is perfect for my skin. I use it daily and have reordered a couple times. I'm grateful for this lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works with consistency!
reviews.reviewText: I have always dealt with bumpy "chicken skin" and never even realized their were products to treat it until I started down the Google rabbit hole. First, this lotion is truly unscented. A little goes a long way; using too much will leave a slightly sticky residue. I took off one star just because of the feeling of it on the skin, but it absorbs okay and isn't too bad. I have noticed an improvement in my skin and have been using this for around a month. The bottle seems small, but it actually lasts a long time.Here is my routine:For the first week, apply both morning and night.Starting the second week, apply in the morning, then use a heavier moisturizer at night (I like Hemps lotion).Once or twice a week, exfoliate with First Aide Beauty KP Bump Eraser scrub.Consistency is key here. But all of these products are decently affordable and last a long time. Hope this helps someone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you have sensitive skin or bumps on the back of your arms, this is the product for you. I have tried a million scrubs and washes for the bumps on my arms. This cleared me up within 6 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves skin soft
reviews.reviewText: I had paired this salicylic acid lotion with a poor strip, and throughout the whole day my skin felt so soft, compared to what it usually felt like on my nasal area used to feel very bumpy. You could feel all the pores, and now it feels as if I have a normal brand new nose.!I had paired this salicylic acid lotion with a poor strip, and throughout the whole day my skin felt so soft, compared to what it usually felt like on my nasal area used to feel very bumpy. You could feel all the pores, and now it feels as if I have a normal brand new note10 out of 10 would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Multi product review after wine drunk shopping
reviews.reviewText: Story time!! I'm 30 years old and I've always had dry skin, prone to stretch marks, slight translucent, and occasional karatosis Pilaris (red, hard bumps, looks like mild acne on arms, chest, back, and butt, leg's) . As a teen I never wore shorts because it was embarrassing not to have soft legs. They didn't look bad, they just were kinda matte even with lotion. Recently I bought Cerave body wash and lotion at the store. My skin looked better, felt better, was so soft and normal. My bumps are gone. After a few glasses of wine I got on Amazon and ordered a bunch of Cerave products to try them out. I got the bar soap, face wash, bumpy skin lotion, bumpy body wash, the dark blue container for extremely dry skin, the pump jar, the day and night cream, and the vitamin C serum. Sober me was happy to see all of these products today. I took a shower and tried different ones and I love them all!!!! No after shower itchy skin from hot water, everything is so soft, no itching or burning from these products. Honestly I've bought so much stuff to help me. Even Aveeno gave me dry skin. Lotion, oil, vaseline, homemade natural stuff whipped up in my kitchen, nothing worked. Just from what I got at the store my skin looked like everyone else's, but tonight it has that extra soft shine without being greasy. Products just soaked right in and my skin feel's comfortable. Some products go better on damp skin. The moisturizing face wash is great but I used it after using the bar soap to remove makeup. The moisturizing face wash doesn't foam up, so sometimes you'll need something extra, but it is super moisturizing. The bar soap is great you have to really work up a lather at first but it's so gentle, and moisturizing. I used it everywhere and when I got out of the shower I wasn't dry and itchy, and this is before lotioning!! Night cream over vita C serum feels so good, not greasy vita C serum is thin, night cream is not heavy, soaked in quick face is so soft. Hang tried the day cream yet, but will tomorrow. Go to the drug store and buy a small lotion, if you like it then I highly suggest trying other thing's, maybe before drinking a half bottle of Moscato. Since I bought so much stuff I'm posting the same comment on the other things I bought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The cream dispenser does not work.
reviews.reviewText: I like the cream for my specific need.
Hasta el dia de hoy son productos que han sido mas funcionales que tanto gasto en doctores

reviews.reviewTitle: Recommend this product for multiple skincare needs
reviews.reviewText: Great product with top quality results. Help with my dry skin and also requires damage.

Its kinda hard to give a review to a product that takes time to have an effect. I'll try to remember to come back with an update.First impressions though, it is an oily cream, so definitely wouldnt use it in the morning. I only got this after watching a youtube recommendation from dermatologists, where they recommended a specific ingredient that this cream has, to help with bumpy skin. I really dont know how this cream is supposed to work, but I'll monitor use over next month, and will see if any improvements appear. I do hope it works though as my skin is a mess right now
